resources.string: The following text is in Sinhalese. Check if you can read it.
Uninstall this app (not needed after the successful install)
Send your device\'s logs to the developer.\nDo this only if you were asked to do so.
SendLog will collect the device log and send it to the developer.\nYou will have an opportunity to review and modify the data being sent.
Install the free SendLog application to collect the device log and send it to the developer.
